name: crud-sqlserver
description: A comprehensive CRUD SQL Server management system built with Electron, Quasar Framework, and Vue.js - نظام إدارة قواعد البيانات SQL Server شامل

scripts.release: npm run release:auto-setup && npm run release:patch
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:push
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:push
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:push
scripts.release:auto-setup: npm run release:check-repo || npm run release:create-repo
scripts.release:create-repo: echo 'Creating GitHub repository automatically...' && gh repo create crud-sqlserver --public --source=. --remote=origin --push || (echo 'GitHub CLI not available. Creating repository manually...' && npm run release:manual-setup)
scripts.release:manual-setup: echo 'Please create repository manually:' && echo '1. Go to: https://github.com/new' && echo '2. Repository name: crud-sqlserver' && echo '3. Make it public' && echo '4. Click Create repository' && echo '5. Run: npm run release:connect'
scripts.release:connect: git remote remove origin 2>/dev/null; git remote add origin https://github.com/MohamedAboElnasrHassan/crud-sqlserver.git && git push -u origin HEAD
scripts.release:push: git push origin HEAD --tags && echo 'Release published successfully!' || echo 'Push failed. Run: npm run release:connect'
scripts.release:status: echo 'Current version:' && npm version --json | grep crud-sqlserver && git status --short
